title.en: After School Lessons for Unripe Apples

altTitles.en: A 90's Cram School for the Unripened

altTitles.pt-br: Lições após a escola para maçãs não maduras

description.en:
That asshole is back as an entirely new level of asshole!   
  
In her final year of middle school, Hwang Miae is stuck with Kim Cheol, a boy she met briefly years ago - he's her classmate… and her neighbor. Now the other kids keep calling them a couple! In a flurry of uneasiness, Cheol starts to avoid Miae like the plague.   
  
You bastard! Do you think you're the only one going through this?   
  
But it doesn't stop there. Destiny won't leave them alone as Kim Cheol and Hwang Miae keep seeing each other everywhere… causing even more trouble. As strange friends intrude on their relationship, Miae experiences puberty the right way…   
  
A new project of <Cheese In The Trap> author Soonkki!

altTitles.en: The Law Of Being Friends With A Male

altTitles.ja: 男友達って彼氏になれる?

description.en: Jay is a guy that wanted to talk with his friend about their secret crushes, When Jay was about to confess who he has a crush on, his friend Jiwoon, who’s crush is actually towards Jay, was hopefull that Jay was going to confess his feelings towards her. But she felt shocked when she learned that actually Jay’s crush was someone else, after that, Jay asked her about her crush, Jiwoon tried to avoid the question and gave him a vague description which caused a misunderstanding that his crush was actually towards Jay’s friend Seohyun. She and Jay are just good friends without anything romantic going on between them, The way Jay interacts with her is just in a friendly manner and tries to help her to get her “crush”….Let the romantic drama begin at school!
description.fr: La première romance de Jiun s'est terminée lorsque son béguin, Jae-i, lui avoue qu'il aime quelqu'un d'autre. Pour aggraver les choses, Jae-i croit à tort que le béguin de Jiun est son effrayant meilleur ami, Seohyeon, et il tente de l'aider à gagner le cœur de celui-ci. Maintenant, Jiun doit faire face à un plus gros problème qu'un amour à sens unique, le petit-copain qu'elle n'a jamais imaginé se rapprocher.
description.ko:
남몰래 '재이'를 짝사랑해온 '지운'.  재이가 자신에게 고백할 줄 알았던 지운은, 재이의 짝사랑 상대가 다른 사람이라는 사실을 알고는 정신이 아득해진다. 
짝사랑이 허무하게 끝났다고 생각함과 동시에, 재이가 자신의 짝사랑 상대를 '서현'이라고 착각하고 있다는 걸 알게 된다. 
그저 재이의 키 크고 덩치 큰 친구 중 하나일 뿐인, 말 그대로 남자인 사람 친구일 뿐인 서현과 자신을 이어주려는 재이의 행동에 해탈하고 마는데...

altTitles.ja: ホワッツ マイケル

description.en:
(from ebookjapan):

Michael's seemingly carefree daily life, with his pampering and begging for food, is thrillingly unpredictable, including a fall from the seventh floor and an interrogation on suspicion of theft of Pen Nibs! Michael's daily life created the golden age of cat manga that took the 1980s by storm! 

The "dancing cat" that won the Kodansha Manga Award, was made into an anime TV series, a TV drama, and even appearing in TV commercials. Michael, who, has become a hit with the general public, is back in digital form! Beware of the too cute cat!

[Official English](https://www.darkhorse.com/Books/3004-968/Whats-Michael-Fatcat-Collection-Volume-1-TPB)

---
- **As mentioned in the description, What's Michael? Won the 10th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 1986, shared with Osamu Tezuka's [Message to Adolf](https://mangadex.org/title/16dc43f3-d6ba-4154-b445-a9d2e674c0eb/message-to-adolf)**

altTitles.th: กับดักหัวใจของนายยิ้มหวาน

altTitles.ja: 君の笑顔は罠

description.en: Ex-idol trainee Kiyu has lived his whole life adored by everyone for his good looks. But he dreams of ordinary high school life, so when he puts on glasses to blend in with his peers, he finds that making friends is a lot harder when you don’t have your looks to fall back on. Not to mention he’s also socially awkward, his new seatmate has a permanent scowl on her face, and his fans have tracked him down at his new school.
description.ko:
살기 뿜뿜 살벌한 여자 차백합과 빛나는 외모를 가린 남자 안기유!
운명처럼 짝이 된 둘의 난감 빠방 스쿨 라이프!
description.pt-br: O ex idol estagiário Kiyu viveu toda a sua vida adorado por todos pela sua boa aparência. Mas ele sonha com a vida normal no colégio, por isso quando põe óculos para se misturar com os seus colegas, descobre que fazer amigos é muito mais difícil quando não se tem uma boa aparência. Sem mencionar que ele também é socialmente embaraçoso, a sua nova colega de assento tem uma carranca permanente na cara, e os seus fãs localizaram-no na sua nova escola.

description.en:
Shen Lang traveled to the past and became a matrilocal son-in-law of a wealthy family. And yet he was kicked out for being a good-for-nothing. So he swore that he would marry a more powerful and striking noblewoman.

I'm not going to practice martial arts in my whole life! I'll groom my wife to be the No.1 martial master in the world! She will kick the ass of anyone who dares to mess with me!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Bilibili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32611)
description.pt-br: Sheng lang foi expulso de casa por ser um desperdício de comida e oxigênio, coisas aconteceram e ele acabou em outro mundo, para sobreviver nesse novo mundo ele precisa aprender artes marciais mas como ele é muito preguiçoso e fraco ele concluiu que sua melhor opção é encontrar uma esposa bonita, rica e talentosa e ser apenas um marido troféu que passa seus dias aproveitando as riquezas da vida!! E se alguém se atreve a perturbar sua paz, ele vai dizer a sua esposa para chutar seus traseiros!!!

title.en: The Saga of Tanya the Evil

altTitles.de: Die Militärischen Aufzeichnungen eines kleinen Mädchens

altTitles.th: บันทึกสงคราม ของยัยเผด็จการ

altTitles.ja: 幼女戦記

altTitles.es: Crónicas de una niña en guerra

altTitles.it: La saga di Tanya la malvagia
Le cronache militari di una ragazzina

altTitles.pt: Crônicas Militares de uma Pequena Garota

altTitles.en: The Military Chronicles of a Little Girl

altTitles.es-la: La Saga de Tanya la Malvada

description.en:
A young girl fights on the frontlines in war. She has blonde hair, blue eyes, and nearly transparent white skin 
as she flies through the air and mercilessly strikes down her enemies. 
Her name is Tanya Degurechaff and speaks with a young girl's lisp while she commands the army. 
Tanya used to be one of Japan's elite office workers, but because of a wrathful god was reborn as a little girl. 
Prioritizing optimization and career advancement above all, she will become the most dangerous entity 
among the Imperial Army's sorcerers.  

Adapted from Light Novel of same name.  

---

**Note:** Manga and Light Novel Licensed in English by Yen Press as "The Saga of Tanya the Evil".
description.es-la: Una joven chica que lucha en el frente de una guerra. Tiene el pelo rubio, ojos azules y una piel blanca, casi transparente, y es conocida por moverse como el viento en el campo de batalla. Ella es Tanya Degurechaff y se encarga de dirigir al ejército. Solía ser un asalariado de élite en Japón, pero debido a la ira de un dios, renació como una niña pequeña. Tanya lo da todo por avanzar en su carrera militar y se convertirá en la maga más poderosa del ejército imperial.

description.en:
"Is this how it feels to have a friend?" 

Bibi is obsessed with Peter, the prince of the school. When she spots Amy next to him, she starts to feel jealous. She invites Amy to her house to warn her, but instead takes a liking to the girl. They agree to be friends on the condition that Amy has to help Bibi confess.
description.fr:
"C'est ce qu'on ressent lorsqu'on a une amie ?"
Bibi est obsédée par Peter, le prince de l'école. Lorsqu'elle repère Amy près de lui, elle commence à être jalouse. Elle invite Amy chez elle pour la prévenir, mais à la place, elle commence à apprécier cette fille. Elles acceptent d'être amies à la condition que Amy doive aider Bibi à se déclarer.
description.ko:
"원래 친구 사이엔 이런 기분이 드는 걸까?"

'비비'는 학교 제일의 킹카 피터에게 집착하다, 그의 곁에 있던 '에이미'를 보고 질투를 느낀다. 그녀에게 경고하기 위해서 자신의 집에 초대했지만 오히려 호감을 느끼게 되고...
둘은 비비의 고백을 돕는다는 조건으로 서로에게 유일한 친구가 되기로 한다.
description.ru:
"Вот что значит быть друзьями?" Биби одержима Питэром, принцем школы.
Когда она замечает Эми рядом с ним, она начинает ревновать. Она приглашает Эми к себе, чтобы предупредить. Но вместо этого Эми нравится ей. Они соглашаются быть друзьями, но при одном условии: Эми должна помочь Биби признаться в любви.

altTitles.ja: 三角形の壊し方

description.en:
Koto, Aya, and Erika were secretly in love with each other.

Koto's thoughts reach Aya for a short while, but Aya disappears as if she had been spirited away.

Seven years later, however, Aya appears to Koto and Erika as she was then...

title.en: The Maid I Hired Recently Is Mysterious

altTitles.en: My Recently Hired Maid Is Mysterious

altTitles.es-la: La criada que contraté recientemente es sospechosa.

altTitles.pt-br: A Empregada que acabei de contratar é muito suspeita

altTitles.ru: Моя новая горничная ну очень подозрительна

altTitles.ja: 最近雇ったメイドが怪しい

description.en:
I hired a maid who has something about her I just can’t put my finger on. Sure, she looks great and is a fabulous cook, but something about her’s not quite right. What have I gotten myself into!?

**Physical volumes version of [this title](https://mangadex.org/title/1f366545-bf36-4f83-b3c1-f65021320a6e/my-recently-hired-maid-is-suspicious-magazine) with added webcomic parts and different chapter numbering.**
description.es: El Joven Amo procede con cuidado debido al hecho de que su nueva criada hace cosas que lo hacen sentirse nervioso e incómodo. ¿¡Qué está tramando esta mujer seductora!?… ¿¡Acaso es amor!?
description.ru: Это рассказ о маленьком мальчике и его недавно нанятой горничной, которая то ли дразнит своего господина, то ли действительно испытывает к нему серьёзные чувства.
description.pt-br: Eu contratei uma empregada, mas tem algo suspeito sobre ela. Claro, ela é linda e cozinha bem, mas tem algo sobre ela que não parece certo. O que será que aquela mulher está tramando? ...Será que é amor?

altTitles.ja: どく・どく・もり・もり

description.en: In the deep, deep forest. a Tamagotake mushroom fairy who has been left alone in the world after her parents were killed is chasing after the culprit, a Tsukiyotake, to take revenge on him. In the Sea of Trees, where life and death intersect, can the young Tamago take revenge on the hated Tsukiyo? An unprecedented mushroom suspense begins.

altTitles.ja: モンスターシュタイン

description.en:
A few decades back, humanity went to war against strange beings such as werewolves and witches, and was on the verge of defeat.

The solution to breaking this deadlock was the human weapon created by Dr. Frankenstein. Time passes, and Vic, a mysterious girl, is traveling with Stein, a large man covered in scars.

All in order to destroy the distorted principles of this world.
description.ja: 十数年前、人狼や魔女など異形の存在との戦争に挑んだ人類は敗北の危機を迎える。その局面を打開したのはフランケンシュタイン博士が生み出した人間兵器――。時は流れ、謎多き少女ヴィクは、傷だらけの大男シュタインと旅をしていた。すべてはこの世界の歪んだ理を破壊するために。

altTitles.ja: ウィンター・ウルフ

description.en:
Is it safe to fall in love with you?
After losing her family to the revolt, noblewoman Lysithea hires Taron, a strapping young broker, to help her flee the kingdom. But when a heavy snowstorm strands the bickering pair in an eerie abandoned mansion, Lysithea has no choice but to rely on her new partner. What dangerous romance awaits them?
description.pl:
Można się w tobie bezpiecznie zakochać?
Po stracie rodziny w wyniku rewolty, szlachcianka Lysithea zatrudnia Tarona, młodego maklera, aby pomógł jej uciec z królestwa. Ale kiedy ciężka burza śnieżna zatrzymuje kłótliwą parę w niesamowitej opuszczonej rezydencji, Lysithea nie ma wyboru i musi polegać na swoim nowym partnerze. Jaki niebezpieczny romans ich czeka?

title.en: Kubo Won't Let Me Be Invisible

altTitles.en: Kubo-san Doesn't Leave Me (a Mob) Be

altTitles.fr: Kubo-san ne me laisse pas tranquille

altTitles.es: Kubo-san no me deja / Kubo-san no me deja ser (un personaje de fondo)

altTitles.id: Kubo-san Tidak Mau Membiarkanku (Seorang Jelata) Sendirian

altTitles.ja: 久保さんは僕(モブ)を許さない

altTitles.zh: 久保同学不放过我 / 久保同學不放過我

altTitles.ko: 쿠보 양은 나를 내버려 두지 않아

altTitles.en: Kubo-san Doesn't Leave Me Be (a Mob)

altTitles.it: Kubo non mi permette di essere invisibile

description.en:
First year high schooler Junta Shiraishi is a mob character who goes unnoticed even when he's standing right next to you. But his classmate, "heroine-level beauty" Kubo, always notices him and is there to tease him. Anyone can become special to someone, but it might be a little too early to call these feelings "love."

Perhaps this story is still two-steps from being a romantic comedy! A sweet comedy where a background character becomes visible!
description.es: Shiraishi Junta es un muchacho simplón que le faltan dos pelos para ser invisible ante sus compañeros de clase; en otras palabras, un personaje de fondo. Esto da entrada a Kubo, su bella vecina de asiento que siempre le da atención y juguetea experimentando con él para determinar qué tan "invisible" él es de hecho… y entonces, ella se declara a sí misma su "heroína"!!!
description.id:
Junta Shiraishi, siswa kelsa 1 SMA, adalah seorang cowok 'figuran' yang tak terasa kehadirannya. Biarpun duduk di sebelah orang, orang itu tidak menyadari kehadirannya, bahkan meskipun ikut terfoto dalam foto bersama, fotonya dibuatkan gambar wajah karena dikira absen. Hanya Kubo-san, cewek cantik teman sekelasnya yang 'level heroine', yang dapat menemukannya dengan matanya yang tajam, dan setiap hari mengusilinya.

Siapa pun bisa menjadi spesial bagi seseorang. Tapi, untuk sampai pada yang namanya 'cinta', perasaan kedua orang itu masih sedikit polos.
description.ru: Шираиши-кун - обычный школьник, только вот он очень неприметный, настолько, что даже одноклассники и учителя не замечают его. Ещё чуть-чуть и он был бы совсем невидимым. Другими словам "моб". В свою очередь, Кубо-сан - его прекрасная соседка по парте, только она постоянно замечает его. Кубо-сан игриво экспериментирует с Шираиши, чтобы оценить - насколько же он "неприметный" на самом деле… А потом объявляет себя его "героиней"!!!
description.pt-br: Estudante do Ensino Médio, Junta Shiraishi passa despercebido por todos, até mesmo quando ele está parado bem ali. No entanto, Kubo-san, a garota mais bonita de sua classe, parece encontrá-lo não importa onde esteja?!

title.en: Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight - Maya and Claudine (MayaKuro) Short Comics Compilation (Doujinshi)

altTitles.en: Maya and Claudine (MayaKuro) Short Comics Compilation (Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight)

description.en: A compilation of short twitter comics about Maya Tendou and Claudine Saijou (a.k.a. MayaKuro) from the anime Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight.

Yin Wudao, a very rich handsome man. Because of the thief Cao, he was tortured and killed by the Dragon King’s son-in-law. However, he accidentally triggered a god-tier Arch Villain System, and his life began again. Since you have chosen to become a Villain, you must become the greatest villain in history. Dragon King, Divine Physician, God of War, Shura, Ancient Martial Master, Immortal… all the geniuses chosen by the heavens I will send them to hell!!! that way the generation of Villain Kings will come out soon…
description.id: Yin Wudao, seorang pria tampan yang sangat kaya. Karena pencuri Cao, dia disiksa dan dibunuh oleh menantu Raja Naga. Namun, dia secara tidak sengaja memicu Sistem Penjahat Agung tingkat dewa, dan hidupnya dimulai lagi. Karena Anda telah memilih untuk menjadi Penjahat, Anda harus menjadi penjahat terhebat dalam sejarah. Raja Naga, Tabib Ilahi, Dewa Perang, Shura, Master Bela Diri Kuno, Abadi... semua orang jenius yang dipilih oleh surga akan kukirimkan ke neraka!!!! dengan cara itu generasi Raja Penjahat akan segera keluar...

altTitles.ja: 凍結したプレイヤーの帰還

altTitles.fr: Le retour du joueur qui était congelé
Le retour du joueur de gel

description.en:
When Seo Junho and his companions sacrificed themselves to defeat the Frost Queen, they thought they were restoring peace to Earth. But after 25 years of being frozen solid, Junho thaws out only to find that nine more floors appeared in his absence, only one of which has been cleared!

As the only one who holds the key to clearing the next floor and defrosting his friends, Junho must step up once again. But has this hero been in hibernation too long to take on the world’s fearsome new foes?

---

description.ja:
2019年世界は変わり、以前にはなかったゲート、モンスター、システム、プレイヤーのような概念が生まれた。 そこから5年間「侵略者」と「侵略を阻止する者」との戦いが世界各地で起きた。 そして世界を絶望に陥れた地球エリア最後のボス「氷の女王」により、5人のプレイヤーの内4人は氷の像となってしまう。 唯一ダンジョンに残された人類最高のプレーヤー、ダークネスは、氷の女王を倒すが、女王の能力を吸収する過程で彼もまた氷の像となった。氷の女王を倒すと、 長い眠りにつくという代価を払わなければならなかったのだー それから25年後…プレーヤーは目を覚ました。 「2階が出現し、計10階だと？1階の氷の女王を倒したら終わりじゃなかったのか？｣ この25年で人類が攻略できたのはたったの2階まで…。 伝説のプレイヤー「ダークネス」の名を捨て、新人プレーヤー伊坂圭として、仲間たちを救うため、彼は再びゲートに向かう！

description.ko:
세상이 바뀌고 5년.
최종보스가 나타났다.

[지구 에어리어의 최후의 보스, 서리여왕이 출현합니다.]

최후의 보스!
그녀만 처치하면 예전처럼 살 수 있다!

인류 최고의 플레이어, 어둑서니를 포함한 다섯 명의 플레이어가 마침내 서리여왕을 쓰러뜨리지만...
그들은 기나긴 잠에 빠지는 혹독한 대가를 치뤄야했다.
그로부터 25년 후.

"2층이라니? 서리여왕을 죽이면 끝나는 거 아니었어?"

얼어붙은 동료들을 구하기 위해,

그리고 세상을 구하기 위해.

전설이 된 어둑서니의 이름을 버리고
이제는 신입 플레이어 서준호로 돌아왔다.

description.ru:
В 2019 году мир переменился, и появились такие явления как: врата, монстры, система и игроки, - которых ранее не существовало. 
На протяжении 5 лет между человечеством и захватчиками происходила борьба за власть и территории.
[Финальный босс "Снежная королева" появился]
Если убить его, человечество сможет обрести свободу и вернуться к прежней жизни. 
24 ноября 2024 года четверо из 5 игроков вошли в последнее подземелье на Антарктиде, чтобы победить финального босса на территории Земли. Одним взмахом руки "Снежная королева" заморозила Тихий океан, повергнув человечество в отчаяние. 
Последнему игроку удалось победить финального босса, однако в процессе поглощения ее "ядра" он превратился в ледяную глыбу. А спустя 25 лет, когда поглощение завершилось, он очнулся от криогенного сна, получив фрост-способность EX-класса.

世界發生了天翻地覆的變化，
在第5年時最終BOSS現身。
「地球區域最終BOSS，冰霜女王出現。」

最終BOSS!
只要除掉祂，就能回到過往的生活!

包含人類最強獵人——闇夜在內的五名獵人，
最終擊潰了冰霜女王...
但他們卻陷入長眠，付出了慘痛的代價。

之後過了25年...
「第2層?不是只要殺了冰霜女王，
一切就結束了嗎?」

為了拯救被冰封的夥伴；
為了拯救整個世界，
我拋下成為傳說的闇夜之名，
以本名徐俊昊，作為新人獵人歸來。

title.en: Tsuihousareru Tabi ni Skill wo Te ni Ireta Ore ga, 100 no Isekai de 2-shuume Musou

altTitles.ja: 追放されるたびにスキルを手に入れた俺が、100の異世界で2周目無双

altTitles.en: I Got a New Skill Every Time I Was Exiled, and After 100 Different Worlds, I Was Unmatched
Unmatched in 100 Different Worlds — I Gain a New Skill Every Time I Get Banished

description.en:
An adventurer named Ed was exiled from his party because he was considered useless, but instead of being sad and upset he was actually happy!!?

It turns out that it's not without reason that he feels happy when he's exiled from his party, because every time he's been exiled he will receive a skill that makes him even more invincible...
- - -
Ed was given the crazy test of having to get expelled from 100 Hero parties in 100 different worlds before he could return to his original world. Finally a mysterious and divine entity said that he had achieved all the conditions to return to his original world.

However, as a final condition he is asked “Look at the fate of one of these exile worlds after you left.” and he is shocked by what he sees.

“Okay, I’ll do it! I’ll go down to these 100 worlds again and be banished with a good feeling!” Ed takes on a new challenge to make full use of the super-powerful “Exiled Skills” that were granted each time he was exiled, and this time ensure they all have happy endings.

Only this time he is accompanied to these 100 worlds by a former companion…
description.id:
Seorang petualang bernama ed di keluarkan dari party nya karena di anggap tidak berguna, namun daripada sedih dan kesal dia malah bahagia!!?.

Ternyata bukan tanpa alasan dia merasa baagia ketika di keluarkan dari party nya di karenakan setiap kali dia di keluarkan dia akan menerima sebuah skill yang membuatnya jadi semakin tidak terkalahkan...

altTitles.uk: Чи правда, що ви одружуєтесь? [365 днів до весілля]

altTitles.ja: 結婚するって、本当ですか

altTitles.ja-ro: Kekkon suru tte, Hontou desu ka

altTitles.th: แต่งงานที่ว่านี่เรื่องจริงเหรอครับ?

description.en: Takuya and Rika are co-workers for a travel agency and have barely ever interacted as they are both introverted, anti-social people. Both are doing their jobs as normal when an announcement from the higher-ups comes down: in one year, an overseas branch will be opening in Siberia, and an employee from their location will be sent to work there! While there's no telling who will be chosen to go, it is explained that people who are married and have families are far less likely to be sent! Neither Takuya nor Rika want to go to Siberia! Desperate to protect their solitary lives, they develop a plan: pretend that they are getting married to each other! Will they be able to keep up this charade for 365 days, and, maybe, even fall for one another in that time?
description.ru: Такуя и Рика — коллеги по туристическому агентству, они практически не общались друг с другом, так как оба — интроверты. Оба заняты своим делом, как обычно, когда приходит объявление от вышестоящего руководства: через год в Сибири откроется зарубежный филиал, и сотрудник из их отдела будет отправлен туда на работу! Неизвестно, кого выберут, но объяснили, что вероятность того, что туда отправят женатых и имеющих семьи, гораздо ниже, чем одиночек! Ни Такуя, ни Рика не хотят ехать в Сибирь! Отчаявшись защитить свою одинокую жизнь, они придумывают план: сделать вид, что женятся друг на друге! Смогут ли они продержаться 365 дней и, может быть, даже влюбиться друг в друга за это время?
description.uk: Гонджоуджі Ріка та Оогара Такуя працюють у відділі планування туристичної агенції JTC в Токіо, вони не люблять спілкуватися і повноцінно живуть спокійним життям наодинці. Однак через відкриття філії в Сибіру Ріка запропонувала Такуї план, щоб не відправитися за кордон. Чи одружаться ці двоє замкнутих людей всього за 365 днів?
description.pt-br: Takuya e Rika são colegas de trabalho de uma agência de viagens e quase nunca interagiram, pois ambos são introvertidos, pessoas anti-sociais. Ambos estão fazendo seu trabalho normalmente quando um anúncio dos superiores chega: em um ano, uma filial no exterior será aberta na Sibéria, e um funcionário de sua localidade será enviado para trabalhar lá! Embora não se saiba quem será escolhido para ir, explica-se que as pessoas que são casadas e têm família são muito menos propensas a serem enviadas! Nem o Takuya nem a Rika querem ir para a Sibéria! Desesperados para proteger suas vidas solitárias, eles criam um plano: fingir que vão se casar um com o outro! Serão capazes de manter esta farsa por 365 dias, e, talvez, até se apaixonar um pelo o outro nesse tempo?

altTitles.ja: ミックス

description.en:
Adachi's second serialization in Gessan Shounen Sunday, follows the story of three siblings, students of Meisei Middle School. Takes place 26 years after Adachi's biggest title, Touch.  
  
Because of the legend left by Tatsuya Uesugi, Meisei Academy High School was well-known for their strong baseball team. But 26 years after their glory, the team has not been able to keep their record and has since lost their fame.  
  
Two stepbrothers, Souichirou and Touma Tachibana, aim to revive of the once-strong Meisei Academy baseball team and enter the National High School Baseball Championship.  
  
(Source: MAL, edited)
description.ja: 舞台は明青学園。同年同月同日に生まれた同い年の兄弟とひとつ違いの妹。上杉兄弟の伝説から２６年、運命の兄弟は今再び明青学園の扉を開く。そして、物語は始まる―――

altTitles.ja-ro: Ane Log - Moyako Nee-san no Tomaranai Monologue

altTitles.th: เจ๊ครับอย่าคิดลึก

altTitles.ja: 姉ログ
姉ログ 靄子姉さんの止まらないモノローグ

altTitles.zh: 姐姐的妄想日志 - 我的弟弟是變態

altTitles.zh-hk: 姐姐的妄想日记 - 我的弟弟是变态

altTitles.ko: 누나 로그 - 내 동생은 우주급의 변태다.

description.en:
When Konoe Moyako and her little brother, Akira, were young, he said he wanted to marry her. Naturally, Moyako decided that her little brother was a complete pervert who was obsessed with her. Now that they're both teenagers, Moyako is convinced she needs to 'rehabilitate' him. However, it seems that the 'perversion' is entirely in her imagination, and she can't seem to help turning completely innocent situations into creepy ones in her mind!  
  
Links to AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime:  
[OAV 1](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=16486)  
[OAV 2](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=16487)

altTitles.ja: 闇金ウシジマくん

description.en:
During the past decades, Japan has become the shining star of Asia, with its noteworthy achievements in the fields of science, technology, medicine, quality of life, and many others.

Yet, while there are a great number of rich and successful Japanese people, there are even more of those engaged in a furious struggle for something as simple as earning to cover their day-to-day living expenses; all the while battling dangerous and money-consuming addictions such as gambling and alcoholism.

What would these poor and not-so people do when they require the money to fulfill their never-ending desires, the desires that are part and parcel of being human? Just how miserable and dangerous might their lives become were they to fall into traps laid by *yamikin*, the loan sharks of the Japanese financial world's dark side, whose only goal is to ensnare such weak-willed souls?

Adapted into film and a J-Drama.

---  
- **Won the 56th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2011**
- **Won the 23rd Japan Media Arts Festival Social Impact Award in 2020**

altTitles.ja: 新しいきみへ

description.en: Sakuma, a teacher at an all-girls school, sees his wife in the red-light district cheating on him one day. In response, he runs away and decides to tour Japan, going wherever his heart may lead him. He finally reaches Odawara and meets a young girl, that looks like the one he always sees in his dreams. He barely manages to stop himself from crossing the line with the girl, and he eventually returns to his normal life, having discovered that his wife's alleged cheating was all a misunderstanding. But then...
description.pt-br: Sakuma, um professor em uma escola só para meninas, vê sua esposa no distrito de prostituição o traindo. Em resposta, ele foge e decide fazer uma turnê pelo Japão, indo aonde seu coração o levar. Ele finalmente chega a Odawara e conhece uma jovem, que se parece com a que ele sempre vê em seus sonhos. Ele mal consegue se impedir de cruzar a linha com a garota e, eventualmente, retorna à sua vida normal, ao descobrir que a suposta traição de sua esposa foi um mal-entendido. Mas então...

How to Make a "Girl" Fall in Love

恋する（おとめ）の作り方

altTitles.th: เมคอัปรักเสกนายให้สวยปิ๊ง

description.en: A popular guy who's secretly interested in cosmetics asks to practice makeup on his dull childhood friend... and he ends up looking cute?!
description.id: Seorang siswa SMA yang populer diam-diam suka dunia kosmetik, dan meminta teman masa kecilnya yang dekil untuk latihan dandan… tapi, teman masa kecilnya malah jadi imut!?
description.es-la: Un muchacho popular que en secreto está interesado en cosméticos le pide a su amigo simplón dejarlo maquillarle para practicar… ¿¡Y termina viéndose bello(a)!?
description.pt-br: Um garoto popular que está secretamente interessado em cosméticos pede para praticar maquiagem em seu amigo de infância … e ele acaba ficando uma Linda Garota ?!

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢の追放後！ 教会改革ごはんで悠々シスター暮らし
悪役令嬢の追放後！

altTitles.es: La villana desterrada viviendo la vida tranquila de una monja haciendo comida revolucionaria en una iglesia

altTitles.zh: 恶役千金流放后！利用教会改革美食过上悠然的修女生活

description.en: Event planner Yuka Sawatani‘s life ended as the result of overwork. Reborn into an Otome game with her memory intact, she becomes the villainess Elizabeth. She tries to resist her fate, but at the ending of the game, she is promptly banished.

title.en: Yuusha to Yobareta Nochi ni: Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru

altTitles.ja: 勇者と呼ばれた後に ―そして無双男は家族を創る―

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha to Yobareta Ato ni - Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru

altTitles.en: After Being Called a Hero - The Unrivaled Man Starts a Family -

description.en: In a world where humans and demons clash — the one who decimated the Demon Lord’s army was a lone hero named Lloyd. Possessing power so immense that he was said by the Demon Lord to be near godlike, after the war, Lloyd was appointed by the king to be the lord of a remote territory and was sent far away. Furthermore, he was tasked with subduing the Emperor Dragon residing in that land, which he quickly defeated. However, the defeated dragon transformed into a beautiful woman and chose to become Lloyd’s companion!? This is the story of a man, hailed as the strongest, yet unable to recognize his own worth, finding a “family”.
description.ja: 人間と魔族が争う世界――魔王軍を壊滅させたのはたったひとりの勇者、ロイドという男だった。魔王から神に近いとまで言われた力を持つロイドは戦後、王により辺境の領主を命じられ、遠ざけられた。さらにその地に棲む皇帝竜の討伐も頼まれたが、早々に倒してしまう。しかし敗れた竜は、美しい女性に変化し、ロイドの伴侶になることに!?これは最強と呼ばれながらも自分自身の価値を見つけられなかった男が「家族」を見つける物語。

altTitles.fr: Comment un Héro réaliste reconstruit un Royaume

altTitles.ja: 現実主義勇者の王国再建記

altTitles.en: How a Realist Hero Rebuilt the Kingdom

altTitles.ja-ro: Genjitsu Shugi Yuusha no Oukoku Saikenki

altTitles.en: A Realist Hero's Kingdom Restoration Chronicle

description.en:
"O, Hero!", with that cliched line, Kazuya Souma found himself summoned to another world and his adventure -did not begin. After he presents his plan to strengthen the country economically and militarily, the king cedes the throne to him and Souma finds himself saddled with ruling the nation! What's more, he's betrothed to the king's daughter now?! In order to get the country back on its feet, Souma calls the wise, the talented, and the gifted to his side. Five people gather before the newly crowned Souma. Just what are the many talents and abilities they possess?! What path will his outlook as a realist take Souma and the people of his country down?   
A revolutionary transferred-to-another-world administrative fantasy series starts here!
description.fr: « Bonjour, Héros ». Après une convocation tout à fait banale dans un autre monde, Kazuya Souma se retrouve à l'aube d'une aventure épique–ou peux être pas. Après avoir présenté un plan pour renforcer économiquement et militairement le pays qui l'avait invoqué, le roi décide subitement de céder son trône à notre héros pour le meilleur et le pire, sans même demander l'avis de Kazuya. Et par-dessus tout, Kazuya se retrouva ainsi fiancé avec la propre fille de l'ancien roi. Afin d’obtenir un pays stable, il fera appel à tous les talents, les sages et les génies pour qu’ils soient à ses côtés. Cinq personnes se réunirent autour de Souma nouvellement couronné pour l’assister. Quels sont ces nombreux talents et les capacités qu’ils possèdent …!? Quelle sera la voie qu’il décidera d’emprunter pour ainsi révolutionner entièrement ce monde fantastique.

title.en: Tenseishita Daiseijo wa, Seijo Dearu Koto wo Hitakakusu: A Tale of The Great Saint

altTitles.ja: 転生した大聖女は、聖女であることをひた隠す A Tale of The Great Saint

altTitles.en: A Tale of the Secret Saint

altTitles.fr: La grande Sainte réincarnée cache que c'en est une.

description.en:
Fia, who is aiming to be a knight in a family of knights, remembers her previous life as a "Grand Saint" when she was on the verge of dying. The saint is currently a highly important and respected profession because it's on the verge of extinction! The holy power she can use happens to be the "lost magic" of myths.  
  
In her previous life, she was threatened by the right arm of the Demon King, saying, "I'll kill you again if you're reborn as a saint."  
  
"If I use such power, I wonder if I would be caught and killed once again…"  
  
Watch as she tries to live a simple life as a knight, hiding the fact that she's a Grand Saint!  


---

- **[Official English License Announcement](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/2020/09/18/seven-seas-reveals-a-great-secret-with-license-of-a-tale-of-the-secret-saint-light-novel-and-manga-series/)**  
- **[Official English Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/a-tale-of-the-secret-saint-light-novel/)**
description.ja: 「剣の才能がない」と言われていた騎士家の少女・フィーア。彼女は死にかかった際、規格外のチート能力を持つ「大聖女」だった前世を思い出し、最強の魔物・黒竜を従魔にする。しかし前世で「聖女として生まれ変わったら殺す」と魔王の右腕に脅されたことを思い出した彼女は、大聖女の力を隠しながら、騎士を目指すが数々の騒動を巻き起こすことに！？

title.en: Ore wo Dame ni Suru Yuki-chan Sensei

altTitles.ja: 俺をダメにするユキちゃんせんせー

description.en:
A man who has nothing to live for goes looking for Yuki, a girl he met five years ago. Yuki is now living in a nursery school, taking care of the children as their "Sensei". When the man is reunited with Yuki, she treats him as a "dear friend," and suggests that he can stay with her. Yuki offers him motherly love and genuine acceptance, so he stays at the day-care center hoping to "keep Yuki to himself" - but what happens?

A depressed man now has a sweet and fluffy girl all over him in this obsessive doting love comedy!

(Source: Comic Gamma Plus, translated)
Ashlyn is a loner in high school with no friends. But when a fateful visit to a haunted house causes her and her classmates to see monsters at night, she'll be forced to forge bonds to survive.

altTitles.ja: BLEACH カラー版
ブリーチ
ブリーチ カラー版

description.en:
Ichigo Kurosaki has always been able to see ghosts, but this ability doesn't change his life nearly as much as his close encounter with Rukia Kuchiki, a Soul Reaper and member of the mysterious Soul Society. While fighting a Hollow, an evil spirit that preys on humans who display psychic energy, Rukia attempts to lend Ichigo some of her powers so that he can save his family, but much to her surprise, Ichigo absorbs every last drop of her energy. Now a full-fledged Soul Reaper himself, Ichigo quickly learns that the world he inhabits is one full of dangerous spirits, and along with Rukia, who is slowly regaining her powers, it's Ichigo's job to both protect the innocent from Hollows and to help the spirits themselves find peace.   
  
Monochrome version won the 50th Shogakukan Manga Award in the Shounen category.
description.es:
Ichigo Kurosaki siempre ha sido capaz de ver fantasmas, pero esta habilidad no cambia su vida tanto como su encuentro cercano con Rukia Kuchiki, una Segadora de Almas y miembro de la misteriosa Sociedad de las Almas. Mientras lucha contra un hueco, un espíritu maligno que se aprovecha de los humanos que muestran energía psíquica, Rukia intenta prestarle a Ichigo algunos de sus poderes para que pueda salvar a su familia, pero para su sorpresa, Ichigo absorbe hasta la última gota de su energía. Ahora que ya es un auténtico Segador de Almas, Ichigo aprende rápidamente que el mundo que habita está lleno de peligrosos espíritus y, junto con Rukia, que está recuperando lentamente sus poderes, el trabajo de Ichigo consiste en proteger a los inocentes de los huecos y ayudar a los propios espíritus a encontrar la paz.  
  
Versión monocroma ganó el 50º Premio Shogakukan Manga en la categoría Shounen.
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do mangá Bleach. A história gira em torno de Kurosaki Ichigo um estudante de 15 anos que tem uma estranha capacidade de ver, tocar e falar com espíritos de pessoas mortas. Logo que o Shinigami (Deus da Morte) Kuchiki Rukia toma conhecimento dos poderes dele ela decide investigá-lo, e acaba em uma luta com um Hollow que foi atraído pelo forte poder espiritual de Ichigo, antes de ser derrotada pela criatura, Rukia passa seus poderes a Ichigo, o qual se torna um Shinigami, e após derrotar o Hollow ingressa em uma jornada para proteger os humanos e os espíritos da ameaça dos Hollows.

description.en:
**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

title.en: Necromancer Academy and the Genius Summoner

description.en: Necromancers have built a name for themselves as fearsome practitioners of magic capable of dropping entire empires to their knees. Simon Follentia is a necromancer with incredible latent talent! After being scouted for the necromancer's academy, this genius is ready to be nurtured and taken to the next level. But could Simon's insane talents attract some unforeseen consequences?

altTitles.ja: バトゥーキ

description.en:
The story of a middle school girl trying to find herself in the confusion of adolescence. Skateboard-loving Ichiri Sanjou, nicknamed "Icchi," may look like a normal energetic kid, but whenever she sees the full moon she is hit with a wave of emotions she cannot comprehend.

The series revolves around her learning the Brazilian martial art of Capoeira.  

From the mind of [Usogui](https://mangadex.org/title/a07320a4-afcd-413a-a451-d69a448d0c28/usogui), Sako Toshio.
description.pt-br: A história de uma garota do ensino médio tentando se encontrar na confusão da adolescência.Ichiri Sanjou, que gosta de skate, apelidada de "Icchi", pode parecer uma criança normal, mas sempre que vê a lua cheia, é atingida por uma onda de emoção que não consegue compreender.A história anda conforme ela aprende a arte-marcial Afro-brasileira, a Capoeira.

description.en:
"I didn’t marry my wife because I loved her. I just signed a contract with her at her request."
I actually knew the truth, so it’s not his fault. I was the one who developed false expectations. I had spent three years as his wife. and I tried hard to be the right woman for him, but I couldn’t get a piece of his heart.
"I didn’t know it would last this long. It’s annoying."
I was nothing to him to the extent that he all but forgot about me as soon as the heroine appeared. In the end, she was always going to be the main character and I was always going to be an extra. No matter how hard I try, my role isn't changing. So it’s only right for me to leave.
"I’m sorry I’ve been bothering you all this time. Please be happy with her."
description.ko: 아슬란의 아내로 지냈던 3년. 그에게 어울리는 여자가 되려고 무던히 노력했으나, 그의 마음을 얻을 수 없었다. 소설 속 여자 주인공이 나타나자마자 버려질 정도로, 나는 그에게 아무것도 아닌 존재였다. 주인공은 주인공, 엑스트라는 엑스트라. 아무리 애를 써도 나는 고작해야 귀찮은 엑스트라에 불과할 뿐. 그러니까 내가 떠나는 게 맞는 것이다.
description.tr: Siz Aşıkken ben aslında gerçeği biliyordum. “Karımla onu sevdiğim için evlenmedim.” Yani bu onun hatası değildi. Yanlış beklentilere sahip olmak benim hatamdı. “Onunla sadece ihtiyaçlara dayalı bir sözleşme imzaladım.” Karısı olarak üç yıl. Onun için doğru kadın olmak için çok uğraştım ama kalbinden bir parça alamadım. “Bu kadar uzun süreceğini bilmiyordum. Sinir bozucu.” Kadın kahraman ortaya çıkar çıkmaz bir kenara atıldığım ölçüde onun için bir hiçtim. Sonunda, ana karakter ana karakterdi ve figüran da figürandı. Ne kadar uğraşırsam uğraşayım, ben sadece sinir bozucu bir figürandım. Rolüm değişmedi. Bu yüzden ayrılmak benim için doğru. “Bunca zaman seni rahatsız ettiğim için özür dilerim. Lütfen onunla mutlu ol.”

altTitles.ja: 魔王の娘、すごくチョロい。

altTitles.en: The Demon King's Daughter Is Way Too Easy

altTitles.vi: Con gái của quỷ vương dễ đối phó thật đấy

description.en: In the final showdown between the Demon King and the Hero, the latter used all his power to seal away the former. To exact her revenge on her father's nemesis, the Demon King's daughter, Hel, resurrected the Hero and planned to use him as her personal servant. However, the resurrected Hero is unexpectedly dazzling and dashing, and Hel's composure begins to waver. Will she ever be able to torment her new servant?
description.ja:
かつて魔王と勇者は対決し、魔王は封印され勇者は力尽きた…。魔王の娘であるヘルは父の仇である勇者への恨みを晴らすべく、彼を蘇らせ、そして下僕としてこき使ってやろうと考えていた。だが、蘇ってきた勇者は何だかやたらとキラキラしていてカッコ良くて、ヘルの調子は狂いっぱなし。

果たして勇者を下僕として苦しめることは出来るのか…!?

title.en: GIRLS und PANZER - Ribbon no Musha

altTitles.en: Girls und Panzer - The Ribboned Warrior

altTitles.ja: ガールズ＆パンツァー　リボンの武者

description.en: Tankathlon is a new form of tank sport gaining slowly gaining popularity among Senshado enthusiasts. While also involving tank battles, Tankathlon is distinguished by its lack of official oversight allowing any school with tanks to participate in a battle anywhere at any time, and a 10-ton weight restriction on tanks used, limiting battles to light tanks and tankettes.

altTitles.ja: リ・モンスター

altTitles.th: Re:Monster ราชันชาติอสูร

description.en: Tomokui Kanata has been reincarnated into the weakest race, goblin, and given a new name, Rou, after having undergone an unfortunate death. However, goblin Rou has retained his previous life's memories and ability to learn skills from what he eats. In this alternate world of survival of the fittest, events unfold. Will a goblin party become the heroes of this world, in a delightful twist from your usual scenario?
description.pt-br: Tomokui Kanata reincarnou na raça mais fraca, a dos goblins e ganhou um novo nome, Rou, após ter morrido de forma infeliz. Entretanto, o goblin Rou preservou as lembranças de sua vida passada, ganhando uma evolução incomum, mas mantendo sua capacidade de ganhar habilidades por comê-los. Neste mundo alternativo de sobrevivência do mais forte, com o desenrolar dos acontecimentos, irá o grupo do goblins se tornarem os heróis deste mundo e o transformarem em um cenário totalmente diferente do habitual? Ele irá se tornar o herói deste mundo ou um soberano das trevas dominará a todos?

description.en: The last thing Ellin remembers is having to deal with a belligerent customer at her dead-end job. And when she opened her eyes… she’s “Solhwa,” the beautiful fourth concubine to the king of the Xyaran Empire. Between trying to learn the language and eating steak, Ellin’s trying to figure exactly what’s going on. Where is she? How did this happen? And who can she trust: Solhwa’s handsome charismatic childhood friend or the elegant, raven-haired king’s advisor?

Julia Green is a teenager who lives in California alone. When she was feeling her loneliest, she unexpectedly encounters an unknown yet strikingly beautiful boy in her closet. Following that incident, whenever she was going through a rough time, William magically appears in her closet. For example, when she spent her birthday alone, on the night of a dance party she has to go to unaccompanied, or having to spend a sad dawn, he appears. Julia naturally ends up falling for William, who stood by her side in every tough moment... A magical love story that transcends time and space, where they have to fight to stand by each other.

altTitles.ms: Melebihi Suami Isteri, Namun Bukan Kekasih.

altTitles.en: More Than A Married Couple, But Not Lovers.

altTitles.ja: 夫婦以上、恋人未満。

altTitles.pt-br: Mais do que um casal, menos do que um amante.

altTitles.th: แผนสมรักไม่สมเลิฟ

altTitles.de: Mehr wie ein Ehepaar, aber weniger als Liebhaber.

description.en: Jirou, a third-year in high school, is forced to live with a gyaru named Akari under a course called the "Couple Practical". In order to be paired with their own romantic interests, they're going to act as a married couple…!?
description.ja: 高校三年生になった次郎は、「夫婦実習」という授業の一環で非リア充な自分とは正反対の存在のクラスのギャル・渡辺星と一緒に暮らすことになってしまう。だが、ペアを入れ替えられる制度を知った二人は、それぞれの好きな人と一緒になるために無理矢理【夫婦】らしい事を演じるのだが…!?
description.vi: Yakuin Jirou, nam sinh năm ba cao trung. Cậu ta buộc phải sống chung nhà với một gái Gyaru tên là Watanabe Akari. Lý do là vì đợt huấn luyện “Cặp đôi“ của trường mà hai người họ theo học. Để được sống với người tình trong mộng của mình, hai người họ phải đã lên kế hoạch sống cùng nhau như một cặp vợ chồng.

title.en: Migawari no Hanayome wa Yandere Ryoushu ni Torawareru

altTitles.ja: 身代わりの花嫁はヤンデレ領主に囚われる

altTitles.en: The Substitute Bride is Captured by the Yandere Lord

description.en: Lala, the daughter of a nobleman, is sent to the castle of Walter the Feudal Lord, in place of her sister who has eloped. Lala is prepared to be treated harshly, but for some reason, Walter grows fiercely attached to Lala as though he was never even remotely engaged to her sister to begin with. ...... It's a story about a love fantasy of a yandere in a fantasy world!
description.ja: 貴族令嬢であるララは駆け落ちした姉の身代わりに、領主・ワルターの城へ行くことになってしまう。手酷く扱われることを覚悟していたララだったが、ワルターは何故か姉との婚約など最初から無かったようにララに激しく執着してきて……。異世界ヤンデレラブファンタジー！

altTitles.ja: カラダ探し

description.en: Look forwards to the ghost story of the red person. "Hey, Asuka… search for my body". At school in the middle of the night, Asuka and her friends search for the scattered body-parts. If they don't find the entire body, the 9th November is repeated and the red person will continue to kill them. Who is the red person? Why is Haruka asking them to search for the body-parts?

altTitles.ja: もっけ
もっけ -物怪-

description.en: This is a fantastic story about two sisters. Shizuru is a junior high school student who can see monsters, whereas normal people can't. Her little sister, Mizuki, is easily haunted by these monsters. They are living in their grandfather's home apart from their parents because of their abilities. Each episode is not horror or too serious, it is rather a heartwarming story.

title.en: This Song Is Only for You

altTitles.es-la: Esta canción es sólo para ti

description.en:
Beneath all the limelight and glory, how many hidden truths are unknown to many? When the laid back yet dominant rockstar meets a gentle but cold surgeon, will sparks fly?   
  
A story about abandoning their facades, restoring the truth, and becoming each other’s saving grace.   
  
“Will you hold on to me even if darkness befalls upon us?”   
  
They never loved someone as deeply as each other. She was willing to descend into hell with him, while he was willing to put down his bloodied knife for her.
description.es-la: Cuando la oscuridad y la luz se entrelazan en la ciudad, ¿será su redención o su condena? Cuando una estrella de rock vaga pero dominante a la vez se encuentra con un gentil pero frío cirujano, ¿saltarán chispas?

altTitles.en: Only I Farm in the Dungeon
I'm the Only One Farming in the Dungeon

description.en: Sejun, your average Seoul underdog, didn’t expect to grow tomatoes full-time when he stumbled into the mysterious dungeon full of monster quests and extravagant rewards. Yet, there he was, as a farmer growing and selling cash crops while clearing numerous quests that came his way. Will Sejun make it out of the dungeon with the plush rewards he hoped for? At least he has what it takes: optimism, resourcefulness, and a group of loyal furry friends.
description.it: Un giorno, una misteriosa torre apparve improvvisamente in città. La gente decise di chiamarla dungeon, e sebbene fosse pieno di asperità e mostri pericolosi, era anche una terra di opportunità, dove erano in attesa innumerevoli tesori. Quando Sejun, un giovane che vive una vita normale, viene invitato per caso nel dungeon sotterraneo, è entusiasta all'idea di diventare ricco, ma è rimasto bloccato in una zona nascosta della torre misteriosa. Tutto quello che ha sono alcuni semi e il suo corpo. Ora Sejun deve coltivare, raccogliere risorse e capire come sopravvivere!

description.en: Da-yeon was excited by the news of legalization of same-sex marriage. I filed a marriage registration with a woman I didn't know because I was drunk....!?
description.ko:
「 레진챌린지에서 독자들의 정신이 아찔해지게 웃기고 설렜던 선 결혼 후 연애 로맨스!! 」
동성혼 합법화 소식에 들떠 번개에 나간 모쏠 레즈 이다연.
술에 취해 모르는 여자와 혼인신고를 해버렸다....!?

altTitles.ja: 不思議のまゆりさん

description.en:
Yuusuke, a 7th grader, is interested in his friend's older sister for various reasons.
The older sister, while a little strange, is a kind and caring girl.
She's mysterious but is popular with everyone.  
This is an ordinary comedy about Mayuri-san's mysterious everyday life.

altTitles.ja: 帰ってください！ 阿久津さん
ヤンキー娘

altTitles.zh: 请你回去吧！阿久津同学

altTitles.zh-hk: 請你回去吧！阿久津同學

altTitles.it: Per favore torna a casa, Akutsu-san!

altTitles.vi: Cút mẹ về nhà đi Akutsu!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor vá para casa, Akutsu-san!

description.en: Ooyama-kun normally doesn’t get involved with Akutsu-san, a delinquent girl in his class, but for some reason she makes his house her hang-out place! Will she do something horrible to him behind closed doors or will he chase her out? But dealing with Akutsu-san’s sexy, cute behavior in such a confined space… he’s sure to get flustered! He wants her to go home, but he also doesn’t? A teasing comedy under a single roof!
description.it: Ooyama-kun normalmente non si fa coinvolgere da Akutsu-san, una ragazza delinquente della sua classe, ma per qualche motivo lei fa della sua casa il suo luogo di ritrovo!  Ooyama le farà qualcosa di orribile a porte chiuse o la caccerà fuori? Tuttavia aver a che fare con il comportamento sexy e carino di Akutsu-san in uno spazio così ristretto... è sicuro che si ecciterà!  Vuole che lei torni a casa e allo stesso tempo non vuole,  Una commedia stuzzicante sotto lo stesso tetto!
description.ja:
**俺の部屋がヤンキー娘のたまり場に!? ヤンキー×非リア充のからかいコメディ！**

普段は全く関わりのないクラスの不良女子・阿久津さんに何故か家をたまり場にされてしまった一人暮らしの大山くん。ガラの悪い阿久津さんに何かひどいことをされるのではと追い出そうとするのだが、無防備で距離感の近い彼女のエロカワイイ仕草にドギマギしてしまい…？ 帰ってほしいのに、帰ってほしくない!? 一つ屋根の下のからかいショートコメディ！

---

**Ore no heya ga yankī musume no tamariba ni!? Yankī × hi riajū no karakai komedi!**

Fudan wa mattaku kakawari no nai kurasu no furyō joshi Akutsu-san ni nazeka ie o tamariba ni sa rete shimatta hitorigurashi no Ōyama-kun. Gara no warui Akutsu-san ni nanika hidoi koto o sa reru node wa to oidasou to suru nodaga, mubōbi de kyori-kan no chikai kanojo no erokawaī shigusa ni dogimagi shite shimai…? Kaette hoshī no ni, kaette hoshikunai! ? Hitotsu yane no shita no karakai shōtokomedi!
description.ru:
Оояма-кун обычно не связывается с Акуцу-сан, девушкой-правонарушителем в его классе, но по каким-то причинам она делает его дом своим тусовочным заведением! Оояма сделает с ней что-нибудь ужасное за закрытыми дверями или он её прогонит? Он хочет, чтобы она пошла домой, но не хочет? Дразнящая комедия под одной крышей!  
  
**Notes:**   
- Yankee Musume (ヤンキー娘) is the pre-serialization name.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/NAGAOKA0)  
- [Artist's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=133935)
description.es-la: Ooyama-kun normalmente no se involucra con Akutsu-san, una chica yankee de su clase, ¡pero por alguna razón ella hace de su casa su lugar de reunión! ¿Ooyama le hará algo horrible cuando estén las puertas cerradas o la echará? Pero lidiar con el sexy y lindo comportamiento de Akutsu en un espacio tan reducido sera un problema…
description.pt-br: Ooyama geralmente não se envolve com com Akutsu-san, uma garota delinquente da sua turma, mas por alguma razão ela transformou o quarto dele no seu local de descanso! Será que ela vai fazer algo horrível para ele ou ele vai expulsar ela? Mas lidar com a sexy e fofa Akutsu-san em um espaço fechado... Ele com certeza vai ficar envergonhado! Ooyama quer que ela vá para casa, mas ele também não quer? Uma comédia provocante sob um mesmo teto!

altTitles.ja: 超人X

description.en:
When an airplane goes down in a plume of black smoke near their city, best friends Tokio and Azuma join the volunteer search and rescue team. But instead of a wreck of twisted metal, they discover that the plane suffered minimal damage and that over 200 of the passengers are still alive! With their services no longer needed, the friends head for home, but on the way, they run into an old enemy who has picked up some bizarre new powers and an obsession with destroying them. Now Tokio and Azuma only have one chance to make it out alive—by becoming the superpowered creatures known as choujin!

Being a superpowered creature isn’t all it’s cracked up to be. Tokio has to hide his transformation from his family and dodge a truancy charge at school, all while dealing with an increasing number of odd incidents happening around town!
description.hu:
Amikor egy repülőgép lezuhan miközben egy különös, fekete füstöt ereget, a két jó barát Tokio és Azuma úgy dönt, hogy csatlakozik az önkéntes kutató és mentőcsapathoz. Azonban egy csomó roncs helyett azt látják, hogy a repülő minimális károkat szenvedett valamint több mint 200 utas túlélte a balesetet. De mivel nem volt szükség már rájuk így elindulnak hazafelé. Viszont az úton szembejön velük egy régi ellenségük, aki valami bizar erő birtokosa lett, és elakarja pusztítani őket. Tokio és Azuma egyetlen esélye a túlélésre az, hogy szupererővel rendelkező lényekké - Úgy nevezett Choujin-okká válnak.

De a szupererő nem megoldás mindenre. Tokio-nak titokban kell tartania az erejét a családja, és iskolája elől, miközben egyre több különös esemény történik városszerte.
description.ru:
Азума Хигаши довольно популярный парень. И хотя он не очень крупный, но обладает хорошими боевыми навыками и сильным чувством справедливости. Также он имеет высочайшие оценки в своём классе. Прямая противоположность Азуме его друг Токио Курохара, который не слишком увлечён учёбой. Даже во время драк он выступает как простой наблюдатель. Тем не менее, невзирая на сложности и различия, эти два закадычных приятеля держатся друг друга.
Оба парня живут в префектуре Ямато – самом обычном регионе страны, который более всего известен тем, что некоторые его области были уничтожены Сверхчеловеком.
description.uk:
Азума Хіґаші доволі популярний хлопець: низенький красень із гарними бойовими навичками, має підвищене почуття справедливості, найкращі оцінки у класі та друга… свою повну протилежність - Токіо Курохару, боязкого хлопчака, який лиш спостерігає за бійками Азуми та ловить ґав на уроках. І все ж, не зважаючи на це, міці їхньої дружби можна позаздрити.

Префектура Ямато, район, де вони живуть, наполовину зруйнований Надлюдьми - особами із небезпечними надприродними здібностями. Часто саме вони влаштовують погроми чи сутички, в центрі яких цього разу й опинился хлопці. Перед загрозою смерті друзі приймають рішення стати Надлюдьми. Зміни торкаються Токіо, який вже не може бути стороннім спостерігачем, він потрапляє у пастку світу, де битва неминуча.
description.vi: Một tác phẩm mới được khắc họa dưới ngòi bút của tác giả bộ manga đình đám tokyo ghoul. "Siêu nhân X" kể về thế giới có những nhân vật đặc biệt được gọi là "Siêu nhân"[Choujin], nhân vật chính là Tokio Kurobara, một học sinh trung học ở tỉnh Yamato, hiện tại cậu ấy cùng người bạn Higashi Azuma thực thi công lý.Và rồi một ngày nọ, khi cả hai rơi vào tình thế hiểm nghèo bắt buộc chỉ còn cách dùng một ống tiêm kỳ lạ...

title.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.ja: 甘神さんちの縁結び

altTitles.fr: Se marier avec une sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai marié une sœur Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
